project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a simple contact book application that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts. The contact information will be stored in a JSON file, and user interactions will occur through the terminal.

task.name: Implement the feature to add contacts
Implement the feature to search for contacts
Implement the feature to update existing contacts
Implement the feature to delete contacts
Implement file handling for storing and retrieving contacts in/from a JSON file
Write tests for each of the features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
